thread.title: Driver critically injured in ATV crash near Antioch Lake County News-Sun
thread.title_full: Driver critically injured in ATV crash near Antioch - Lake County News-Sun

author: Dan Moran
title: Driver critically injured in ATV crash near Antioch Lake County News-Sun
text:
An overnight crash involving an all-terrain vehicle (ATV) in unincorporated Antioch left a man hospitalized with critical injuries Saturday.
Lake County Sheriff's police report that deputies were dispatched to West Grass Lake Road and Lake Shore Drive near Antioch around 2:15 a.m. on Saturday for a report of a crash involving a four-wheeler ATV. Arriving deputies reported locating a 32-year-old male driver critically injured.
According to a statement issued Saturday, a preliminary investigation indicates two ATVs were traveling eastbound on Grass Lake when the 32-year-old driver lost control of his ATV. The ATV rolled and the driver was ejected.
The man reportedly was transported to Advocate Condell Medical Center in Libertyville in critical condition. The statement added that the crash remains under investigation by the Lake County Sheriff's Technical Crash Investigations Unit, which will determine if drugs, alcohol, or roadway conditions played a factor in the crash.
